name: Amazon App Mesh
short: A service mesh for microservices running on AWS that simplifies traffic management and secure communication.
description: Amazon App Mesh is an AWS service that simplifies the operations of microservices. It works by providing service discovery, traffic routing, and fault injection, allowing users to manage microservices with ease. App Mesh integrates with other AWS services such as Amazon ECS, Amazon EKS, and AWS Fargate, and provides end-to-end visibility into application performance. With its features, users can create and maintain applications with high availability and low latency, ensuring optimal performance.
